titles.title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to extend the Milk Income Loss Contract Program through the end of calendar year 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Dairy, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 9/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to extend the sign-up date and contract duration for national dairy market loss payments through December 31, 2005.
